name: The Mysterious Case of the Mystery
name_original: The Mysterious Case of the Mystery
description:
Use your handy ol' fashioned detective board to solve the case of the man in the canal. 

Controls:

-LMB: Interact

-RMB: Move

Scroll-Wheel: Zoom in and Out

Instructions:

Investigate to find more information. Question suspects about other things to find more information. Accuse suspects of crimes with evidence to do that.

Known Bugs:

It will press through a UI button to the cards behind.

The font is unreadable at distance.
